name: Asteroid Avoider (Liam_x220)
description:
Use the Left and Right arrow keys to dodge the asteroids.

This game is just a game I made while learning the Godot Game Engine. It is very basic but I hope you like it.

Any and all feedback is welcome!

Art and Code By: Liam_x220

Source Code: https://github.com/Liamx220/Asteroid-Avoider
